question: Tarikh-i-Shershahi was written by which of the following authors?
explanation: Tarikh-i-Shershahi or Tohfa-i-Akbarshahi is a useful work on the Lodi dynasty. The Tarikh-i-Sher Shahi is a historical work compiled by Abbas Khan Sarwani in 1580 CE. He was a waqia-navis under Mughal Emperor Akbar.
